data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Tottenham.
In the minute 1, An attacking Man Utd player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Bruno Fernandes nets and Man Utd now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
Tottenham have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Tanguy Ndombele equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 5, Man Utd to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Mason Greenwood gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man Utd.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 7, In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Tottenham have got their heads in front thanks to a Heung Min Son strike.
That's a fine assist from Harry Kane.
In the minute 9, Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Tottenham have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Anthony Taylor signals a Man Utd throw-in in Tottenham's half.
Man Utd will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tottenham.
Throw-in for Tottenham at Old Trafford.
In the minute 14, Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
Harry Kane (Tottenham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Man Utd.
In the minute 20, Marcus Rashford of Man Utd is pulled up for offside.
Important block from the Tottenham defence as Mason Greenwood fires in a strike for Man Utd.
Mason Greenwood of Man Utd gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Anthony Taylor signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Tottenham's area.
Tottenham's Serge Aurier gets in a shot on goal at Old Trafford. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 27, In Manchester, Erik Lamela of Tottenham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 28, Tottenham's Tanguy Ndombele gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Anthony Martial (Man Utd) is red-carded and dismissed.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Tottenham are pushing forward but Pierre Hojbjerg's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Erik Lamela (Tottenham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Harry Kane extends Tottenham's lead to 1-3.
In the minute 31, Great play from Heung Min Son to set up the goal.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 34, Man Utd needs to be cautious. Tottenham have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Anthony Taylor signals a Tottenham throw-in in Man Utd's half.
In the minute 37, Goal! Heung Min Son extends Tottenham's lead to 1-4.
Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tottenham's half?
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Tottenham.
Goal kick for Tottenham at Old Trafford.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anthony Taylor awards Tottenham a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Anthony Taylor will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Serge Aurier (Tottenham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
In the minute 45, Harry Kane (Tottenham) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 45, Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Nemanja Matic with Scott McTominay. This is the first substitution made today by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
Fred is replacing Bruno Fernandes for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
Lucas Moura is replacing Erik Lamela for the away team.
In the minute 47, Tottenham drive upfield and Serge Aurier gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 51, Serge Aurier puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-5.
Pierre Hojbjerg with an assist there.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick in a good position for Man Utd!
Man Utd are coming forward and Paul Pogba gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
In the minute 55, Tottenham's Harry Kane gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
Throw-in Man Utd.
In the minute 57, Tanguy Ndombele for Tottenham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Anthony Taylor awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 61, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Tottenham in Manchester.
Free kick Tottenham.
In the minute 63, Eric Bailly (Man Utd) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Man Utd.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is making the team's third substitution at Old Trafford with Donny van de Beek replacing Mason Greenwood.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 69, Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tottenham make their second substitution with Dele Alli replacing Tanguy Ndombele.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 71, Free kick Man Utd.
Throw-in Tottenham.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Tottenham pushes forward through Harry Kane, whose finish on goal is saved.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In Manchester, Dele Alli (Tottenham) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Jose Mourinho (Tottenham) is making a third substitution, with Ben Davies replacing Heung Min Son.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 75, Tottenham push forward at Old Trafford and Sergio Reguilon gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Man Utd defence.
Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
In the minute 78, Tottenham have been given a penalty at Old Trafford...
Harry Kane gives Tottenham a 1-6 lead from the penalty spot.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
In the minute 82, Anthony Taylor signals a Man Utd throw-in in Tottenham's half.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
In the minute 84, Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Tottenham just outside Man Utd's area.
At Old Trafford, Luke Shaw has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Tottenham.
In the minute 89, Man Utd needs to be cautious. Tottenham have an attacking throw-in.
In Manchester, Harry Kane of Tottenham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
At Old Trafford the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
The match is over. Final score 1-6.
